name: paintshop
description: A modern paint and photo editor built with Preact and Vite. Features dual-mode editing, dark theme support, and comprehensive drawing/photo editing tools.
author: PaintShop Contributors

scripts.git:autopush: git diff --quiet || (git add . && git commit -m 'bot: pushing changes onto git' && git push)
scripts.analyze-ui: rm -rf evidence/* && yarn dev & sleep 3 && yarn capture-evidence && kill %1
